translations: v.撒小谎（fib 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He laughs loudly when I accuse him of fibbing.
sentences.translation: 我指控他撒谎时，他笑得很大声。

sentences.sentence: Now, after studying thousands of corporate earnings calls, two researchers from Stanford University think they've come up with a way to tell when senior executives are fibbing.
sentences.translation: 在研习上千公司的财报会议之后，现在斯坦福大学的两名研究者认为他们已经找到一种能揭穿高级主管们撒谎的方法。
